response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to maximize the value of your investment. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your business.", "product_price": 12000}
